content: The proposed educational model aims to provide a comprehensive learning experience for non-majors in robot education. By incorporating the SDGs and sustainability into the education method, students can develop an understanding of the impact of technology and engineering on the world, and their role in creating a more sustainable future. Through the use of books to gain empathy and understanding of real-world problems, students will develop their computational thinking skills, critical thinking abilities, and problem-solving skills. The model encourages hands-on learning, immersion, and collaboration, providing a constructive learning environment that enhances creativity, divergent thinking, and problem-solving skills.
